item.title: About
item.description: What is c13n Pronounced “c-thirteen” Sitting on top of Bitcoin & Lightning Network layer, c13n is a component that makes your interaction with LN much easier. It acts as an intermediate layer between your application and your LN Node, without introducing any centralization characteristics. c13n utilizes the node’s interface to achieve a higher-level API, easy for devs to get used to and to start building on top of right away.

item.title: Contact
item.description: You can send a mail to support@c13n.io.
